#ifndef __MEMORY_OPERATIONS_LIST__
#define __MEMORY_OPERATIONS_LIST__ \
  X(OPERATION_INVALID) \
	X(OPERATION_READ) \
	X(OPERATION_WRITE) \
	X(OPERATION_UPDATE) \
	X(OPERATION_EVICT)
